simplesect.para: The various modes in which CI can run in. Optimistic means that CI will allow unregistered (unknown) commands it ingests that are valid to be published to the CFE SB. Commands that are registered will adhere to the stepping they are registered with. Pessimistic mode will reject any command ingested that is not registered.

briefdescription.para: CFS Command Ingest Task (CI) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: CFS Command Ingest Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the RPR main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS Command Ingest (CI) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Command Ingest application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) CI data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the CI application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by CI application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the CI application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the CI application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Command Ingest Task (CI) cleanup prior to exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function handles any necessary cleanup prior to application exit.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the CI application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

The expected length of the message

The size of the message from the ingest buffer. A size of zero indicates "no message to process".
